message: He doesn't seem to have a agenda

And how does supporting Bernie """"The Commie"""" Sanders help the """"Conservative"""" cause, claims to believe in & support?! Doesn't this make Beck himself a hypocrite, not only on his """"conservative"""" stance but his notion of Trump? I mean when you come out supporting Sanders, calling Trump a liberal, is almost laughable! The fact is, Donald Trump, couldnt possibly be worse than what we have & sure as hell couldnt be worse than Hillary Clinton! He is successful, his children are well manered & successful in their own right, I believe he really does love America & will do what he says. He doesnt take any crap, doesnt apologize and well heeled to address the issues of our economy & trade. I dont think people give Trump enough credit, he may just pleasantly surprise people!
When is Obama our President going to speak to his people to stop this. Does he still have our backs or is he part of the problem

I agree with all of this...however, I think that if we had a true living wage, we could actually lower capital gains and corporate taxes. If we had a living wage that would generate enough tax revenue to fund the government, we wouldn't need to tax investment or incorporation. If we had a real living wage, I could personally support eliminating capital gains taxes, and reducing corporate taxes down to just under 10% (to cover environmental liability, contributions to social security/universal medical care/unemployment insurance).
But 2 years means they don't think he is long term either..uggg

All the people that said he would be a bad President I hope he proves all of them wrong.....

Yes, he has the right to protest """"because he's a black man in a white man's country"""": I would sympathise more if he was a POOR black man struggling to make ends meet and being victimised due to his skin, but he's not, he is an extremely RICH guy, made rich by the obscene amount of $ a still mainly white country is paying him. Believe me, I feel the same about soccer players in the UK who earn more in ONE WEEK than I have probably earned in my lifetime, and by using legal loopholes only pay about 2% tax on their millions while I have to pay 20% because I cannot afford a fancy accountant...

Yup. Put this on the county clerk """"Contact Us"""" form: Hello Ms. Davis, Thank you for doing God's work. I am the Reverend B.E. Davis of the First Church of the Sabbath in rural Harford County, Maryland. We are so proud of you. It's about time this country put God's law first instead of the heathen laws of man. We are so glad to hear your story as we'd like to have a demonstration to support the sanctity of marriage. As I am sure you know, the same portions of His word referencing foul homosexuality as a sin also state a wife is to always obey her husband's desires and never to as much as disagree, else face stoning. How delighted we were to find out about you doing the Lord's work, let alone a multi-time divorcee. Please join us in a stoning ceremony. Does tomorrow or Thursday work better for you? Yes, for Jesus, you can demonstrate that His law and love are above man's! While you may suffer severe injury, the eternal blessings are well worth the cost. In advance, thank you! We know all you do to uphold God's law is difficult and you are shunned for it, but it will pay you back tenfold. In His loving name, Rev. B.E. Davis
